text: Is it possible to hide provided default themes?

I would like to report an incident on the marketplace. Two customers bought a HubSpot email template on the marketplace and they did not receive the template on their account. After checking their account I can confirm that they have not received anything and that it is reported as not purchased. I have received the payment via PayPal. If you can solve the problem to avoid the inconvenience caused to HubSpot customers. Thank you in advance.

when working with custom quote templates, what kind of permissions do i need in the Personal Access Key? Cos I’m getting this error message on my terminal : “This app hasn’t been granted all required scopes to make this call. Read more about required scopes here” and following the steps here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-from-the-cms-quotes-theme-beta>
[For other HubSpotters] Noting that Moadh reached out to me via DM, conversing there to get this resolved.

If I have move a domain from one Enterprise portal to another, and there are tons of redirects associated that need to be imported, is there anyway to get redirects created ahead of time in the destination portal before re-point the domain so there is no potential down time
Hey <@U24GZQ3GF>! It's not currently possible, but it's something we're looking into! Would you be interested in talking more about it? If so, I'll DM you :slightly_smiling_face:
Yes definitely! Could be a cool revenue stream for some companies.
